changelog:
Version 10.67622 – First Public Release & Core Features

   This is the first stable release of Sketchy Trainer. The app is designed to help Sketchware Pro users by sharing tutorials directly from our YouTube channel.

⦁ Added
 ▫ Initial public release of Sketchy Trainer.
 ▫ Integrated YouTube API support.
 ▫ Access to tutorial videos from our YouTube channel.

⦁ Stability
 ▫ First stable build prepared for public use.
